Klasse GenericStackClass<T>

java.lang.Object
GenericStackClass<T>
Typparameter:
T - Typ Parmater for flexible work with datatypes
public class GenericStackClass<T> extends Object
A generic class for stacks. In this class one can push (add), pop (remove and get last added stack) and peek (get last added stack not removing).

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    GenericStackClass()
     
    GenericStackClass(int counter)
    Constructor to initialize the stack with a given counter and a null array.
    GenericStackClass(T[] stacks)
    Constructor to initialize the stack with a provided array and set the counter to 0.
    GenericStackClass(T[] stacks, int counter)
    Constructor to initialize the stack with a provided array and counter.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GenericStackClass

      public GenericStackClass(T[] stacks, int counter)
      Constructor to initialize the stack with a provided array and counter.
      Parameter:
      stacks - the array of elements that represents the stack
      counter - the counter that keeps track of the current position in the stack

    • GenericStackClass

      public GenericStackClass(T[] stacks)
      Constructor to initialize the stack with a provided array and set the counter to 0.
      Parameter:
      stacks - the array of elements that represents the stack

    • GenericStackClass

      public GenericStackClass()

    • GenericStackClass

      public GenericStackClass(int counter)
      Constructor to initialize the stack with a given counter and a null array.
      Parameter:
      counter - the counter that keeps track of the current position in the stack

  • Methodendetails

    • push

      public void push(T item) throws NullPointerException, StackFullException
      adding an element or stack into the array stack
      Parameter:
      item - the element or stack, which will be added
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - for null elements
      StackFullException - for overflowed stack array

    • pushAutomatic

      public void pushAutomatic(T item) throws NullPointerException
      adding an element or stack into the array stack. If there ist no place left, the stack array becomes bigger
      Parameter:
      item - the element or stack, which will be added
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - for null elements

    • pop

      public T pop() throws StackEmptyException
      removing and returnin the last added element or stack of the stack array
      Gibt zurück:
      the last added element
      Löst aus:
      StackEmptyException - for empty stack or stack array

    • peek

      public T peek() throws StackEmptyException
      returning the last added element without removing.
      Gibt zurück:
      the last added element
      Löst aus:
      StackEmptyException - for empty stack or stack array

    • list

      public String list() throws StackEmptyException
      A methode, with return a String list of the stack array.
      Gibt zurück:
      output list of the stack array
      Löst aus:
      StackEmptyException - for empty stack or stack array
